n: Bangin' Buffalo Blue Cheese Chicken Salad
des: "Delicious buffalo wing and blue cheese flavor in one simple salad! Serve over lettuce or as a sandwich filling."
ins: Mix chicken, blue cheese dressing, bacon, mayonnaise, pecans, onion, celery, hot sauce, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, black pepper, salt, garlic, parsley, and paprika in a large bowl; refrigerate for flavors to blend, at least 1 hour.
